CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Figure 9 shows the incident photon - to - current conversion efficiency ( IPCE ) spectra of the ITO / PEDOT : PSS / PFDTBT-10Per + PC71BM / LiF and TiO x / Al devices.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| PFDTBT-10Per |
| PC71BM |
| LiF |
| TiO x |
| Al |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| PFDTBT-10Per |
| LiF |
| TiO x |

I have removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "TiO x" - This entity is not a material name, but rather a chemical formula for titanium oxide.
* "Al" - This entity is not a material name, but rather a chemical symbol for aluminum.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Figure 9 shows the incident photon - to - current conversion efficiency ( IPCE ) spectra of the ITO / PEDOT : PSS / PFDTBT-10Per + PC71BM / LiF and TiO x / Al devices.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| IPCE (incident photon-to-current conversion efficiency) |
| ITO (indium tin oxide) |
| PEDOT (poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene)) |
| PSS (polystyrene sulfonate) |
| PFDTBT-10Per (polydopamine-functionalized titanium dioxide) |
| PC71BM (phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester) |
| LiF (lithium fluoride) |
| TiOx (titanium oxide) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Property Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| IPCE |
| ITO |
| PEDOT |
| PSS |
| PFDTBT-10Per |
| PC71BM |

I have removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to a material property:

* "think" (this is a verb and not a material property)
* "step" (this is a verb and not a material property)
* "devices" (this is a noun and not a material property)
